attributes.action: FIN EQUALS STOP SHARK FIN IMPORTS AND SALES IN GREAT BRITAIN
attributes.additional_details:
Once you have watched the video
FIN – Help End the Horror on http://bit.ly/PCt8eT.
which shows the truth on how sharks are caught, their fins cut from their bodies, the shark tossed back into the sea STILL ALIVE, suffering a slow, painful, lingering death
Join me in calling for BANNING the IMPORTATION and SALE of all shark fin products in Great Britain.

FACT: 100 million sharks are killed each year with the bulk of this to feed the demand for Shark Fin Soup which is seen as a delicacy in some cultures.

FACT: YOU can help by signing the e petition NOW
Every person signing this petition would like our government to make the UK shark fin free.
